--- Derek James <blue5432@...> wrote:
<snip>
> As a starter suggestion, I'd suggest creating
> directories for each implementation of NEAT, based
> on
> the language/platform its written in, with an
> accompanying directory for documentation for each,
> and
> a directory for examples/benchmarks for each
> implementation.  It would also be nice to have a
> top-level directory with documentation related to
> NEAT
> (research papers, etc.) and perhaps a doc with an
> overview of each implementation (i.e., an
> elaboration
> of the section of Ken's NEAT User's page that talks
> about deciding which implementation to use.
<snip>
Those seem like good ideas to me.  That would help me
when I finally begin studying NEAT in earnest.

=====
Mitchell Timin
